Notes.title: Morning Routine Preference
Notes.message: Prefers to have breakfast before taking morning medications. Usually more cooperative after eating.

Notes.title: Music Therapy Response
Notes.message: Shows positive response to classical music, particularly Mozart. Becomes calmer during afternoon sessions with piano music.

Notes.title: Social Interaction
Notes.message: Enjoys conversation about gardening and flowers. Family mentioned they used to be an avid gardener before moving to care facility.

Notes.title: Activity Preference
Notes.message: Prefers group activities in the morning. More withdrawn during afternoon activities.

Notes.title: Comfort Items
Notes.message: Carries a small photo of their late spouse. Becomes distressed if photo is misplaced.
